title: Ticket #6686: HTCondor View: add sed script to rewrite <base> tag
description: We need a sed script to rewrite the <base> tag in already-rendered HTCondor View HTML. This will let users change where the site is being served from without re-rendering the HTML, which requires running a Python script. The sed script needs to be written in a way that the HTCondor config file can interact with it.
